subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous fort was built by Raja Man Singh I of Amber?
question_hi: पूर्वजाना के अम्बर के राजा मन सिंह I ने किस मंगलवाला बनाया?
explanation_en: Amer Fort is the main seat of the Jaipur royal family and hence not built by Raja Man Singh I of Amer. The correct answer is Kumbhalgarh Fort, which was built by Raja Rai Singh.
explanation_hi: अमेरिका मंगलवाला मंगलवाला कंगार मंगलवाला का निर्माण अमेरिका मंगलवाला कंगार मंगलवाला का संगार
explanation_en: Amer Fort is the main seat of the Jaipur royal family and was built by Maharaja Man Singh I of Amer. However, the correct answer is Kumbhalgarh Fort, which was built by Raja Rai Singh.

Amer Fort is a famous historical site in Jaipur and was built by Maharaja Man Singh I of Amer. Kumbhalgarh Fort, however, was built by Rai Singh, a general of the Rajput king Maharana Kumbha of Mewar.
